name: NSPersistentCloudKitContainerEventRequest
desc: A request to fetch setup, import, or export events in a persistent CloudKit container.

items.name: class func fetchEvents(after: Date) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a fetch request for events after a specified date from a persistent CloudKit container.

items.name: class func fetchEvents(after: NSPersistentCloudKitContainer.Event?) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a fetch request for events that occur after a specified event from a persistent CloudKit container.

items.name: class func fetchEvents(matchingFetch: NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a fetch request for events that match a specified fetch request from a persistent CloudKit container.

items.name: class func fetchForEvents() -> NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>
items.desc: Creates a fetch request for all events in a persistent CloudKit container.

items.name: var resultType: NSPersistentCloudKitContainerEventResult.ResultType
items.desc: The type of result that the request returns.
